EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_451PivotalVMwareGoogleContainers_AR_Q317.Download Con
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Pivotal, VMware and Google come together on containers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the 451 Research report: Pivotal, VMware and Google come together on containers. For additional resources, including analyst reports, webinars and eBooks, check out our resources page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources]]> and our containers topic page <[[https://pivotal.io/containers]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
For in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[http://info.pivotal.io/Fu0UN00cl0I002j0000JCA0]]>, taking place December 4-7, 2017 in San Francisco.
